Package main

Class Sound

java.lang.Object
main.Sound
public class Sound extends Object
contains the sound library and the methods to play and stop both SE and music

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    (package private) Clip
    clip
    holds the current music file
    (package private) Clip[]
    clipList
    holds the sound's file ready to play
    (package private) URL[]
    soundURL
    holds the sound's files

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Sound()
    loads all the sound files into an array

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    play()
    starts and loops the sound loaded in "clip"
    void
    playSE(int i)
    starts the specified sound loaded in "clipList"
    void
    setFile(int i)
    opens the sound file in order to play it and loads it into an array "clipList" (used for sound effects)
    void
    setMusicFile(int i)
    opens the sound file in order to play it and loads into the variable "clip" (used for music)
    void
    stop()
    stops the sound loaded in clip

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      public Sound()
      loads all the sound files into an array

  • Method Details

    • setFile

      public void setFile(int i)
      opens the sound file in order to play it and loads it into an array "clipList" (used for sound effects)
      Parameters:
      i - (index of array)

    • setMusicFile

      public void setMusicFile(int i)
      opens the sound file in order to play it and loads into the variable "clip" (used for music)
      Parameters:
      i - (index of array)

    • play

      public void play()
      starts and loops the sound loaded in "clip"

    • playSE

      public void playSE(int i)
      starts the specified sound loaded in "clipList"
      Parameters:
      i - (index of array)

    • stop

      public void stop()
      stops the sound loaded in clip
